name: Odallus: The Dark Call
notes: By default the game uses a TV Mode option that provides a CRT-like bulge effect and scanlines.  This can be turned off in the 'Options' in the launcher that appears before clicking 'Play' to start the game.  Turn TV Mode to Off.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Odallus - The Dark Call/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
